subject: SIMSONN PRO PLUS PEDALS - New control box to make it compatible with Simsonn Software?
description_text:
I currently have the Simsonn Pro Plus Pedals (Older Model) The one that
ships with the old control box. The only way I can customize the settings
is through the Freejoy Configuration App.

Basically I want to get the Simsonn VAM Haptic Pedal Reactors for my pedals
but my current control box doesn't have a port for them.

If I buy the new Control Box (Plus X Control Box) Will my current Pro Plus
pedals work with it? And will I finally be able to use the Simsonn Software
through it?

Thank You!

conversations.body_text: Hi Benjo,    If it is version 1.7.1, you can update the pedal firmware in Simsonn Manager via: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.  If it is version 1.7.0, you can purchase the PlusX controller box. It supports Pro Plus pedals and also provides vibration motor interfaces.     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
